subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon defeated fifth-seeded Julien Benneteau, 7-5, 6-2, in an all-French clay-court final in Casablanca, Morocco, for his third career title. The 23-year-old Simon’s other titles came last year in Marseille, France, and Bucharest, Romania.
snippet: Gilles Simon defeated fifth-seeded Julien Benneteau, 7-5, 6-2, in an all-French clay-court final in Casablanca, Morocco, for his third career title. The 23-year-old Simon’s other titles came last year in Marseille, France, and Bucharest, Romania.
